abstract: In contrast to global giants like Procter & Gamble and General Electric, Citigroup lacks a bench of seasoned leaders ready to take over the company.
snippet: In contrast to global giants like Procter & Gamble and General Electric, Citigroup lacks a bench of seasoned leaders ready to take over the company.
lead_paragraph: Wall Street has been contemplating a successor to Charles O. Prince III almost since he took over as Citigroup’s chief executive four years ago. Now the job is actually open.

headline.main: Next Chief at Citigroup Likely to Be an Outsider
headline.print_headline: Next Chief at Citigroup Likely to Be an Outsider
